smokeping_url_hint: Base URL of your Smokeping instance (without /cache/)
smokeping_targets_hint: Comma-separated list of targets (e.g. Global.Google, Vodafone.Hop2)
smokeping_setup_intro: Smokeping measures network latency by sending pings to configured targets. DOCSight can display these graphs alongside your modem data.
smokeping_setup_step_1: Install and configure Smokeping on your network
smokeping_setup_step_2: Note the base URL of your Smokeping web interface
smokeping_setup_step_3: Enter the URL and target names in DOCSight Settings
